specVersion.description: The version of the location protocol this record is using

timestamp.description: Time the location proof was created.

eventTimestamp.description: Time of the event referenced by the location proof.

array.description: Proof recipe payload: Encoded data specific to the proof recipe, which could include encrypted location data, a zero-knowledge proof, or references to other verification data.

srs.description: Spatial Reference System: the coordinate system within which the object is positioned (e.g ESPG:4326)

value.description: The location of where the work was performed as a URI or blob.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
